content: The information that the Toilevator is manufactured by GMS Group Medical Supply comes from the company's official website and other online sources, such as product listings on retailers' websites and online reviews. GMS Group Medical Supply is listed as the manufacturer and distributor of the Toilevator on their website, which provides detailed information about the device's features, specifications, and installation instructions. In addition, retailers that sell the Toilevator typically list GMS Group Medical Supply as the manufacturer and may provide additional information about the company and its products.
